latex: Let $ABCD$ be a square pyramid of height $\frac{1}{2}$ with square base $ABCD$ of side length $AB=12$ (so $E$ is the vertex of the pyramid, and the foot of the altitude from $E$ to $ABCD$ is the center of square $ABCD$). The faces $ADE$ and $CDE$ meet at an acute angle of measure $\alpha$ (so that $0^{\circ}<\alpha<90^{\circ}$). Find $\tan \alpha$.
